Foundation Helps Provide Access to Home Learning Resources for All Families
Key Points About Hawthorn District 73’s Parent Notification System
Hawthorn Elementary South Is Named Among the Best Schools in the Nation By U.S. Department of Education

div.style: border-width:1px; border-color:#e2e2e2; border-style:solid; padding:18px; background-color:rgba(28,73,0,0.23); border-radius:12px;

div.p: Click here to access remote learning activities during school closures.
As of April 13, there is a new schedule for Hawthorn’s meal service. This service is provided to families with children 18 and younger during remote learning days.
Download the 2019-2020 quick look calendar. The 2020-2021 quick look calendar is now available.
Handbooks, medical forms, downloadable calendars, district data & other resources
Schedule a meeting with Superintendent Pete Hannigan.
The Key to 73 Hawthorn Education Foundation is unlocking opportunities for every child
Subscribe to Hawthorn Highlights and weekly school newsletters.
Stay up-to-date on community events, announcements & opportunities

article.class: av-magazine-entry av-magazine-entry-id-41141 av-magazine-format-standard av-magazine-type-post av-magazine-entry-1 av-magazine-entry-big

a.title: Link to: Coronavirus Updates and Resources
Link to: Coronavirus Updates and Resources

div.div: While Hawthorn School District 73 buildings are currently closed, we have implemented a Remote Learning Plan for students. The current return date is May 1. Student, staff and stakeholder health, safety and well-being are our highest priorities. We continue to monitor the outbreak of the Coronavirus Disease 2019 (COVID-19) very closely, and are committed to providing regular updates to the community.
